description: Aries has a new girlfriend that wants to have a threesome with him and another guy. He knows that Max has been with guys before and asks him for advice. Max starts showing him some things he can do with another dude and Aries seems to be a natural at it all. Its not too long before Max has his cock down his throat. He even gets a chance to try some man ass. Dont miss all the hot man milk gushing out by the end of this one. HOTTT!!
title: Loving Aries
